net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.custom

Class CopyMinionSpell

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.Spell
      • net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.custom.CopyMinionSpell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, HasDesc<SpellDesc>

    public final class CopyMinionSpell
extends Spell
    Transforms the source (casting entity) of this spell into the target Minion.

    The transformation includes all of the Trigger objects that are associated with (hosted by) the target.

    This spell can be used to interrupt summons.

    The transformation does not count as a summon effect.

    For example, to transform into a target minion in a battlecry: 

         {
         "targetSelection": "MINIONS",
         "spell": {
             "class": "CopyMinionSpell"
         }
     }
    To transform into a random minion on the battlefield: 
         {
         "spell": "CopyMinionSpell",
         "target": "ALL_OTHER_MINIONS",
         "randomTarget": true
     }
    See Also:
    for more about transformations., Serialized Form
